attributes.action: Bring back Civil Defence Sirens across the UK
attributes.additional_details: Due to increased tension between Russia-Ukraine, Europe, China-Taiwan. It’s the best way to alert people of threat to the country.
attributes.background: The government should re-install civil defence sirens across the UK

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for local authorities. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
